BEFORE:
for line in stream:
            if line.strip() == '<DOC>': break
        # Read the document
        out.append(line)
        for line in stream:
            out.append(line)
            if line.strip() == '</DOC>': break
        # Return the document
        return ['\n'.join(out)]
AFTER:
while True:
            line = stream.readline()
            if not line: break
            if line.strip() == '<DOC>': break
        out.append(line)
        # Read the document
        while True:
            line = stream.readline()
            if not line: break
            out.append(line)
            if line.strip() == '</DOC>': break
        # Return the document
        return ['\n'.join(out)]
